Who: VENOM, CHOPSHOP, Lamia
Location: Around the wreckage

Chopshop carefully cut a hole open in the side of the shuttle, the
cutters on the side of his mandibles slicing neatly into the side of
the ship. Shifting back into robot mode Chopshop caught the metal
chunk he had cut out and laid it to the side, revealing a hole large
enough for he and Lamia to enter the ship. Water from the interior of
the ship began to run through the new hole in the ship.

> Lamia noddes and said "the massster will be pleasssed with this new
> recluit"She transformed and went inside, moving carfully ready for
> everything

Inside the ship is dark and dank, water has dripped in from the
outside and pools of it sit on the floor, which both Lamia and
Chopshop step into as the entered, the water reaches up almost to
their knees in spots as they walk, although now with the hold that
Chopshop had cut, the water was quickly draining, and the water level
is beginning to drop.

The chamber where they stood seemed to be a cargo hold of some type,
although whatever cargo it held seems to be long gone, if there ever
was anything here at all.

To the right leads back to the engine room of the ship as well as the
sleeping quarters, although from the size of them, this ship was not
designed for comfort or long travels.
The ship itself is not very large

To the left is the cockpit, which like the rest of the ship, is
heavily damaged and has water along the floor boards. It is heavily
crumpled and a single pilot lay slumped over the controls, the body
impaled by several stout tree limbs and large pieces of bent metal.

(TAG)

Preston
